mapper.select: ORDER BY A.updatedate DESC, bno DESC LIMIT #{limit},#{amount}
mapper.sql: SELECT A.bno , A.title, A.writer, A.content, if( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,A.regDate,NOW())>1440 ,DATE_FORMAT(A.regdate,'%Y-%m-%d') , DATE_FORMAT(A.regdate,'%H:%i')) AS regdate, if( TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE,A.updateDate,NOW())>1440 ,DATE_FORMAT(A.updateDate,'%Y-%m-%d') , DATE_FORMAT(A.updateDate,'%H:%i')) AS updatedate FROM tbl_board A
